title: Strong Legs
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Allows you to hop over obstacles.
You may target a tile up to four tiles away, but you may land anywhere within two tiles of that space.
After hopping, you may not hop again until you have spent time without moving.||You can hop short distances. |- |2||Extends the range of your hop to six tiles.||You can hop long distances. |- | colspan="3" | '''Species notes:''' Exclusive to [[barachim]]. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good_mutations|Good mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]]
